definition: surname Cheng/Cheng (c. 2000 BC), third of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
to bear/to carry/to hold/to continue/to undertake/to take charge/owing to/due to/to receive
picul (100 catties, 50 kg)/two buckets full/carrying pole and its load/classifier for loads carried on a shoulder pole
to undertake/to carry/to shoulder/to take responsibility

sentences.chinese: 爬得再高一些，承擔一些風險。

sentences.english: Therefore, HR becomes a kind of pass-through in the information cycle.
sentences.chinese: 因此，人力資源人員在信息循環中承擔傳遞的角色。

sentences.english: He backed the costs of the new play.
sentences.chinese: 他同意承擔這出新戲的費用。

sentences.english: All arbitration fees will be borne by Party B and be paid in advance.
sentences.chinese: 涉及仲裁費用，全部由乙方承擔並預交。

sentences.english: Although issuer gets right gold, need to assume the market to turn over aweather danger however.
sentences.chinese: 發行者雖然收到權利金，卻需要承擔市場反向風險。

sentences.english: Lastly, we assume a standard atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 最後，我們承擔一個標準大氣。

sentences.english: Guofang Baisheng stores are not responsible for the points being used by people aside from the card owner.
sentences.chinese: 國芳商場對被其他人使用的積分不承擔責任。

sentences.english: The respondent shall not be liable for compensating the injuries for RST.
sentences.chinese: 答辯人對RST傷害賠償不應承擔責任。

sentences.english: This is the commitment of Damanhur for the future.
sentences.chinese: 這就是達曼胡爾對未來承擔的義務。

sentences.english: Nor would we undertake an obligation to concert US-Soviet actions toward third countries.
sentences.chinese: 我們也不承擔協調美蘇針對第三國行動的義務。

sentences.english: The trust group will not bear loss of the entrusted company.
sentences.chinese: 託管組不承擔被託管證券公司的虧損。

sentences.english: However, the assignor may be liable to the obligor for breach of contract.
sentences.chinese: 但是，讓與人可能因而向債務人承擔違約義務。

sentences.english: But we cannot let her carry this burden on her own.
sentences.chinese: 但我們不應讓她一個人來承擔這個重任。

sentences.english: At that time we were busy restoring the Dunhuang Murals, and could find no time for that task.
sentences.chinese: 但因爲當時敦煌百廢待舉工作繁重，無法承擔。

sentences.english: To assume the functions and responsibilities of the Foreign Affairs Office of the autonomous region.
sentences.chinese: 承擔區委外事工作領導小組辦公室的職責。

sentences.english: The river basin administrative organ subordinated to the Ministry of Water Resources undertakes the hydrologic industrial administrative work as empowered by the Ministry.
sentences.chinese: 水利部所屬流域機構承擔部授權的水文行業管理工作。

definition: to be in charge of/to take responsibility for/to be to blame/conscientious
to promise/to undertake to do something/commitment
to depend on/to be dependent on
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
